test_source_code:
def test_websocket_route(app, url):
    ev = asyncio.Event()

    @app.websocket(url)
    async def handler(request, ws):
        assert request.scheme == "ws"
        assert ws.subprotocol is None
        ev.set()

    request, response = app.test_client.websocket(url)
    assert response.opened is True
    assert ev.is_set()
